generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, used for vehicular traffic, including cars in the background and the crosswalk the pedestrians are using.
- sidewalk: The curb on the right side of the image, along with the pedestrian path adjacent to it, indicates a designated area for pedestrians, which is a sidewalk.
- building: The large yellowish structure with multiple windows and a tiled roof in the background is clearly a building.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the roadside, fitting the definition of vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows the open sky with clouds, without any tree leaves obstructing the view.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking across the road, fulfilling the definition of person.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road in the background, including a black SUV and a silver sedan.
- pole: A tall, vertical pole with a traffic light attached is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is mounted on the pole on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A white sign with text and pricing information is visible on the left side of the image, which is a commercial sign, not a traffic sign. There are no visible traffic signs as defined (non-commercial, authority-installed signs).
- terrain: The grassy area near the building on the left side of the image is a terrain feature.

Note: The traffic sign class is not present because the visible sign is a commercial advertisement, not a traffic sign as defined.
